person.bio: Peter is HR-manager and Financial Advisor For TF Tech. Besides that Peter is an entrepreneur active in the world of start-ups and scale-ups for about 8 years now. Next to running the best business center in Belgium, where he lets companies grow and develop themselves, he is Kristofâ€™s financial guy for several interesting projects in Belgium, Spain & Egypt. Co-Founder fell in love with Threefold I believe in equal chances for everyone across the globe.
person.excerpt: Peter is HR-manager and Financial Advisor For TF Tech.
